p: Catalase enzyme was assayed in the samples following the protocol of Chance and Maehly [ 28]. In brief, crude extract was prepared from fresh leaf (1 g) homogenized in 5 mL of 50 mM K 2HPO 4 buffer (pH 7.0) along with 2 mM sodium-EDTA and 1% (w/v) PVP. A reaction mixture of 3 mL containing 2 mL of 100 mM Na 2HPO 4 buffer (pH 6.8), 0.5 mL of H 2O 2 (30 mM) and 0.5 mL enzyme was prepared and decline in the OD reading was read at 240 nm. Bradford method was used for the total soluble protein estimation [ 26].
